summary: Just discovered Debauchery through the breast enhancement sorcery comic. Needless to say it’s love at first sight for me
question: Just discovered Debauchery through the breast enhancement sorcery comic. Needless to say it’s love at first sight for me
answer: Aw gosh I’m glad you like her!! She’s one of my favourites too haha I was just writing one of the last hots scenes with her for A While last night and i was like damn…. i miss her already…. <- has not even drawn the pages introducing her yet

summary: breast augmentation surgery might not have been invented until like the 1950s and thus not make sense in vaguely 17th century...
body:
sorcererest-sorcerer:

diosmaden:

breast augmentation surgery might not have been invented until like the 1950s and thus not make sense in vaguely 17th century esque fantasy land but that wont stop debauchery

If you’re going to tell me that I can’t include trans representation in my writing because it’s “historically inaccurate” well first of all

Wrong

And second of all, bold of you to assume I would even touch real world history.

Ah historical accuracy has nothing to do with haha, I pick and choose things from like roughly the 16th to the 18th century for inspiration which averages out into something kind of 17th centuryish in vibe.

And I like researching the history of medical transition actually! It’s interesting to see what advancements we made when, and what social and medical transition looked like in the past. You don’t have to be aiming for historical accuracy to get inspiration from the past.

I also intentionally don’t want there to be “spell or potion that changes your gender”. While that can be a fun fantasy for many people, it’s not very reflective of real people’s transitions, and I want something more grounded than that.

We didn’t start synthesising oestrogen until the late 1800s, which evidently is outside this time period range, but Debauchery does synthesise hormones anyway bc having magic in this world the timeline of medical discoveries isn’t going to be the same as ours, and “distilling and extracting oestrogen from the urine of a pregnant ewe” is the kind of insane experiment she’d do anyway. (real world was mare urine for clarity, but there are no horses in this setting)

But regardless there’s just a particular vibe I’m trying to create, and silicone breast implants are too modern in vibe. so debs is gonna figure something else out 👍

And I like researching the history of medical transition actually! It’s interesting to see what advancements we made when, and what social and medical transition looked like in the past. You don’t have to be aiming for historical accuracy to get inspiration from the past.

I also intentionally don’t want there to be “spell or potion that changes your gender”. While that can be a fun fantasy for many people, it’s not very reflective of real people’s transitions, and I want something more grounded than that.

We didn’t start synthesising oestrogen until the late 1800s, which evidently is outside this time period range, but Debauchery does synthesise hormones anyway bc having magic in this world the timeline of medical discoveries isn’t going to be the same as ours, and “distilling and extracting oestrogen from the urine of a pregnant ewe” is the kind of insane experiment she’d do anyway. (real world was mare urine for clarity, but there are no horses in this setting)

But regardless there’s just a particular vibe I’m trying to create, and silicone breast implants are too modern in vibe. so debs is gonna figure something else out 👍

summary: noticed a couple folks purchasing my brushes after posting the tempest n callie portraits. While I did indeed use my brushes, I...
body:
diosmaden:

diosmaden:

noticed a couple folks purchasing my brushes after posting the tempest n callie portraits. While I did indeed use my brushes, I also used this brush from the asset store (free)! So you might wanna play with that one as well

while im at it another free brushset i use sometimes is these horn ridge brushes. I dont have tilt support on my tablet tho so i had to change some settings and ive also applied the same texture as i use on my other brushes to integrate them better. also enjoy tamberellas various brushsets.

also my own brushes can be found here

Brushes

Been meaning to do this for a long time now, my brushes page has been updated to no longer use a carousel for better accessibility. I go over every brush in my brushpacks here and what I use them for!

summary: Join the Heart of the Server Discord Server!
body:
diosmaden:

Join the Heart of the Server Discord Server!

Well I was not expecting to post this one tonight LOL I was planning to double check some final setups and added the patreon bot, which promptly automatically added patrons to the server so erm!! i guess it’s real now!

hi hotties! there is now a heart of the storm discord server if that is something that interests you :)

If you purchased the PDF, you can let me know and I’ll give you access to the spoiler channel so you can talk with other people who’ve finished the chapter! See you there maybe!

summary: The challenge of the month in the comic creator server im in was "draw your characters as realistically as you can," and I...
body:
diosmaden:

The challenge of the month in the comic creator server im in was “draw your characters as realistically as you can,” and I needed to do something to grease the gears after taking the majority of the month off from art, so I painted Callisto :)

» You can read my webcomic here!

reblog.tree_html:
diosmaden:

The challenge of the month in the comic creator server im in was “draw your characters as realistically as you can,” and I needed to do something to grease the gears after taking the majority of the month off from art, so I painted Callisto :)

» You can read my webcomic here!
